```{r}
hex_gg = ggplot(simpsons_locations, aes(x =  neuroticism, y = extraversion)) +
    stat_bin_hex(aes(fill = after_stat(density), colour = after_stat(density)), 
                 bins = 10,
                 size = 1) +
    scale_fill_viridis_c(option = "B") +
    scale_color_viridis_c(option = "B", guide = "none") +
    labs(x = "Neuroticism", y = "Extraversion", fill = "",
         colour = "") +
    theme_minimal()
hex_gg
```
